lines.text: This is such a quaint town. Look at those laborers, walking about their lives.
I have more important things to do, now. I'm off to buy a diamond.
I wonder where my chauffeur is. He left with the car MINUTES ago.
I cannot possibly stand around in these shoes for much longer.
Great Balls? Oh, child, you are so easily satisfied. My Poké Balls are made of solid gold.
But they get bumps very quickly, so I have to replace them often. Oh well!
I sent my grandson off to see the world with so little. He only has one Rattata.
And his blue suit. And a mere five million PokéDollars in cash. I hope he survives. Oh...
